name: Proctor NBF Capital Partners
overview: National Bank Financial (NBF) is one of the top six investment dealers in Canada, and the undisputed leader in Quebec. NBF itself was created by the merger of a number of different brokerage firms over the years, including such reputable names as Levesque Beaubien, Geoffrion Leclerc, First Marathon, J.D. Mack, Capital Group, Equitable Securities, Rademaker McDougall & Company and Oswald Drinkwater and John Graham. NBF is a truly integrated firm, combining retail advisory and brokerage services with institutional brokerage, investment banking, corporate finance and securities clearing services for third parties.
